Questions.Question: What does '你有笔吗?' (Nǐ yǒu bǐ ma?) mean?

Options.A: How are you?
Options.B: Do you have a book?
Options.C: How many books do you have?
Options.D: Do you have a pen? (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '几支笔' (Jǐ zhī bǐ) mean?

Options.A: How many books do you have?
Options.B: How many pens are there? (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: How would you ask, 'How many students do you have?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你有什么笔？ (Nǐ yǒu shén me bǐ?)
Options.B: 你有几个学生？ (Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè xuéshēng?) - Correct Answer
Options.D: 你有几支笔？ (Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ?)

Questions.Question: What does '他一定是老师' (Tā yī dìng shì lǎo shī) mean?

Options.A: He is definitely a teacher. (Correct Answer)
Options.B: He is not a teacher.

Questions.Question: Which of the following is the Chinese phrase for 'elementary school'?

Options.A: 大学 (Dàxué)
Options.B: 中学 (Zhōngxué)

Questions.Question: How would you say, 'Not necessarily, some are boys, and some are girls' in Chinese?

Options.A: 不一定，有男的，有女的 (Bù yīdìng, yǒu nán de, yǒu nǚ de) - Correct Answer
Options.B: 他一定会说中文 (Tā yīdìng huì shuō zhōngwén)
Options.C: 他一定是老师 (Tā yīdìng shì lǎo shī)
Options.D: 不一定，都是男孩 (Bù yīdìng, dōu shì nán hái)

Questions.Question: What does '个个学生都用功' (Gè gè xué shēng dōu yòng gōng) mean?

Options.A: Each student is lazy.
Options.B: Each student works hard. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: How do you ask, 'What kind of pen do you have?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你有什么笔 (Nǐ yǒu shén me bǐ) (Correct Answer)
Options.B: 你有几支笔 (Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ)
Options.C: 你有几本书 (Nǐ yǒu jǐ běn shū)

Questions.Question: What does '小学校' (Xiǎo xué xiào) mean?

Options.A: Small school
Options.B: Middle school (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: How do you say, 'I have twelve students' in Chinese?

Options.A: 他一定是老师 (Tā yīdìng shì lǎo shī)
Options.B: 你有几支笔 (Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ)
Options.C: 我有十二个学生 (Wǒ yǒu shí èr gè xuéshēng) (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '一栋房子' (Yī dòng fángzi) mean?

Options.A: A school
Options.B: A house (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: How would you describe a house that is '非常好' (fēicháng hǎo)?

Options.A: Very big
Options.B: Very expensive

Questions.Question: What does '那所学校很大' (Nà suǒ xuéxiào hěn dà) mean?

Options.A: This school is big.
Options.B: That school is big. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: Which phrase means 'a lot of'?

Options.A: 很少 (Hěn shǎo)
Options.B: 多少 (Duōshǎo)

Questions.Question: How would you say, 'My books are very few in number' in Chinese?

Options.A: 我的书数量非常多 (Wǒ de shū shù liàng fēicháng duō)
Options.B: 我的书数量很少 (Wǒ de shū shù liàng hěn shǎo) (Correct Answer)
Options.C: 我有多少本书？ (Wǒ yǒu duōshǎo běn shū?)
Options.D: 我的书在学校里找不到 (Wǒ de shū zài xuéxiàolǐ zhǎobúdào)

Questions.Question: What is the Chinese phrase for 'How many books does Mr. Wang have?'

Options.A: 你有多少本书？ (Nǐ yǒu duōshǎo běn shū?)
Options.B: 王先生有多少本书？ (Wáng xiānsheng yǒu duōshǎo běn shū?) (Correct Answer)
Options.C: 这所学校真的很大。 (Zhè suǒ xuéxiào zhēnde hěndà.)
Options.D: 王小姐真的很忙。 (Wáng xiǎojiě zhēnde hěnmáng.)

Questions.Question: How would you say, 'This pen is really good for writing' in Chinese?

Options.A: 他的书数量非常多 (Tā de shū shù liàng fēicháng duō)
Options.B: 这支笔真的很适合写字 (Zhè zhī bǐ zhēnde hěn shìhé xiě zì) (Correct Answer)
Options.C: 不，我没有笔。 (Bù, wǒ méiyǒu bǐ)
Options.D: 这本书在学校里找不到。 (Zhè běn shū zài xuéxiàolǐ zhǎobúdào)

Questions.Question: What does '还行 (Háixíng)' mean?

Options.A: Very good (Correct Answer)
Options.B: Not good

Questions.Question: How would you say, 'This school is very big, isn't it?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 是的 (Shìde)
Options.B: 不，不是 (Bù, bùshì)
Options.C: 这所学校真的很大 (Zhè suǒ xué xiào zhēnde hěndà) (Correct Answer)
Options.D: 不，我没有书 (Bù, wǒ méiyǒu shū)

Questions.Question: What is the Chinese phrase for 'Foreigner'?

Options.A: 外国 (Wàiguó)
Options.B: 外国人 (Wàiguórén) (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '他比我聪明' (Tā bǐ wǒ cōngmíng) mean?

Options.A: He is definitely a student.
Options.B: You are smarter than I am. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: How would you ask, 'What kind of pen do you have?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你用什么样的笔写字？ (Nǐ yòng shénmeyàng de bǐ xiězì?) (Correct Answer)
Options.B: 我用铅笔写字。 (Wǒ yòng qiānbǐ xiězì.)
Options.C: 他也很聪明，也很勤奋。 (Tā yě hěn cōng míng, yě hěn qín fèn.)
Options.D: 你有几个学生？ (Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè xuéshēng?)

Questions.Question: What does '孩子们比成年人更努力' (Hái zi men bǐ chéng nián rén gèng nǔ lì) mean?

Options.A: The children are lazier than adults.
Options.B: The children work even harder than adults. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: How do you ask, 'Are you going or am I?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 他很睿智 (Tā hěn ruìzhì)
Options.B: 你是去还是我 (Nǐ shì qù hái shì wǒ) (Correct Answer)
Options.C: 我的学生非常努力 (Wǒ de xuéshēng fēicháng nǔ lì)
Options.D: 他真的很愚蠢 (Tā zhēndehěn yúchǔn)

Questions.Question: What does '他也很聪明，也很勤奋' (Tā yě hěn cōng míng, yě hěn qín fèn) mean?

Options.A: He is very smart and hard-working too. (Correct Answer)
Options.B: He is very stupid.
Options.C: Smart people can do stupid things.
Options.D: My Chinese is inferior to yours.

Questions.Question: How would you say, 'The teacher is busier than the students' in Chinese?

Options.A: 老师比学生更忙 (Lǎo shī bǐ xuéshēng gèngmáng) (Correct Answer)
Options.B: There are more boys than girls. (Nán hái bǐ nǚ hái duō)
Options.C: The teacher did not teach this word. (Lǎoshī méiyǒu jiào zhègecí)
Options.D: This pen is really good for writing. (Zhè zhī bǐ zhēn de hěn shì hé xiě zì)

Questions.Question: What does '我用铅笔写字' (Wǒ yòng qiānbǐ xiězì) mean?

Options.A: His pen is like mine.
Options.B: You and I are students.
Options.C: I use a pencil to write. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '外观，外观' (Wàiguān, wàiguān) mean?

Options.A: The two books are almost alike.
Options.B: The children are lazier than adults.

Questions.Question: What does '我的学生非常努力' (Wǒ de xuéshēng fēicháng nǔ lì) mean?

Options.A: You are smarter than I am.
Options.B: My students work very hard. (Correct Answer)
Options.D: The teacher is busier than the students.

Questions.Question: How would you say, 'There are fewer boys than girls' in Chinese?

Options.A: 男孩比女孩少 (Nánhái bǐ nǚhái shǎo）(Correct Answer)
Options.B: 女孩和男孩一样努力(Nǚ hái hé nán hái yí yàng nǔ lì)
Options.C: 你和我史学史那个 (Nǐ hé wǒ shì xuéshēng)
Options.D: 他的书比我多. (Tā de shū bǐ wǒ duō)

Questions.Question: What does '请坐' (Qǐng zuò) mean?

Options.A: Please say.
Options.B: May I ask?

Questions.Question: What does '请问你有没有笔？(Qǐngwèn nǐ yǒu méiyǒu bǐ)' mean?

Options.A: May I ask if you have a book?
Options.B: May I ask if you have a pen? (Correct Answer)
Options.C: Please introduce us to each other.

Questions.Question: What is the meaning of '我姓王' (Wǒ xìng wáng)?

Options.A: My first name is Wang.
Options.B: My last name is Wang. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '他要我干什么?' (Tā yào wǒ gànshénme) mean?

Options.A: What does he want from me? (Correct Answer)
Options.B: What is his name?
Options.C: May I ask if you have a pen?

Questions.Question: What is the translation of '那位女士是谁？(Nà wèi nǚshì shì shéi)'

Options.A: Who is that lady? (Correct Answer)
Options.B: Please have some tea.
Options.C: May I ask if you have a pen?

Questions.Question: What does '很高兴认识你' (Hěn gāoxìng rènshí nǐ)mean?

Options.A: Please introduce us to each other.
Options.B: I'm very pleased to meet you. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What is the translation of '我也不认识他' (Wǒ yě bù rènshí tā)?

Options.A: I don't know him either. (Correct Answer)
Options.B: Please sit down.

Questions.Question: What is the meaning of '我们有十五名教师' (Wǒmen yǒu shíwǔ míng jiàoshī)?

Options.A: We have fifteen students.
Options.B: We have fifteen schools.

Questions.Question: What does 'May I ask your name?' mean in Chinese?

Options.A: 我可以问你的名字吗？ (Wǒ kěyǐ wèn nǐ de míngzì ma?) (Correct Answer)
Options.B: 你叫什么名字？ (Nǐ jiào shénme míngzì?)

Questions.Question: What is the Chinese phrase for 'What is his job?'

Options.A: 他是做什么的？ (Tā shì zuò shénme de?) (Correct Answer)
Options.B: 他叫什么名字？ (Tā jiào shénme míngzì?)
